activities:
Keeper software allows users to manage their passwords and 
private information on their mobile phones, tablets and 
computers. Keeper uses encryption technology to safeguard the 
user’s data, which is stored in a secure, cloud-storage system.
Keeper is sold under a ‘freemium’ model, which lets consumers 
use the full application with all cloud-storage and sync features 
for 30 days. After 30 days, the consumer may use Keeper on 
their device without the paid (premium) features including 
cloud-storage, sync and backup. Keeper is sold under an annual 
subscription plan for $9.99 per device per year.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
